title: Dynamic (Lazy Init) Localization of Applications, Powered by Bing Translator.
body: Please develop a new type based on string(i.e. LocalizationString) that will harness the Bing Translator API at the time of download by lazy translating the text into the device's local language and saving the translation dictionary of that app for future downloads of that locality or retrieve the existing copy of the app in that locality.
